successes.title: iStick™: USB Flash Drive with Lightning for iPhone and iPad
successes.description: iStick™: The World's first USB flash drive with integrated Apple Lightning connector. Made for iPhone & iPad.

Pledges.description: Didn't get a chance to back iStick before it sold out? Pledge $1 and keep up-to-date on all things iStick with exclusive updates, iStick availability or more. You can also sign up for more updates at http://eepurl.com/Unrer
